quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
author: Goku (Dragon Ball Z)

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist)

quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

quote: A lesson in chasing your dreams: no matter how many people laugh, don’t give up.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
author: Brook (One Piece)

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

quote: To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to happiness you could have.
author: Matsumoto Rangiku (Bleach)

quote: Fear is freedom! Control is liberty! Contradiction is truth!
author: Satsuki Kiryuuin (Kill la Kill)

quote: No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

quote: The ticket to the future is always open.
author: Vash the Stampede (Trigun)

quote: Knowing you're different is only the beginning. If you accept these differences, you'll be able to get past them and grow even closer.
author: Miss Kobayashi (Dragon Maid)

quote: When you give up, your dreams and everything else they're gone.
author: Inuyasha (Inuyasha)

quote: To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to happiness you could have.
author: Matsumoto Rangiku (Bleach)

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist)

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

quote: A lesson in chasing your dreams: no matter how many people laugh, don’t give up.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

quote: If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

quote: Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.
author: Rider (Fate/Zero)

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

quote: It’s not the face that makes someone a monster, it’s the choices they make with their lives.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

quote: The ticket to the future is always open.
author: Vash the Stampede (Trigun)

quote: Whatever you lose, you’ll find it again. But what you throw away you’ll never get back.
author: Kenshin Himura (Rurouni Kenshin)
